description: A simple wooden stool with uneven legs, typical of working-class civic furnishings

core:description.text: A straightforward stool of plain wood, its seat worn smooth from countless hours of use. The legs are slightly uneven, betraying its rough-hewn construction, but it serves its purpose well enough. The kind of practical seating found in taverns, workshops, and public offices throughout the realm.

core:portrait.altText: A simple wooden stool with uneven legs and a worn seat
